6.7 Identifier reference

stock_object

Datatype

datatype stock_object =
      ANSI_FIXED_FONT |
      ANSI_VAR_FONT |
      BLACK_BRUSH |
      BLACK_PEN |
      DEFAULT_GUI_FONT |
      DEFAULT_PALETTE |
      DKGRAY_BRUSH |
      GRAY_BRUSH |
      HOLLOW_BRUSH |
      LTGRAY_BRUSH |
      NULL_BRUSH |
      NULL_PEN |
      OEM_FIXED_FONT |
      SYSTEM_FIXED_FONT |
      SYSTEM_FONT |
      WHITE_BRUSH |
      WHITE_PEN
